On the other hand, the movie itself is not so compelling that it would necessitate prioritizing it over other commitments or experiences, thus placing it closer to the 'need to sit one out' end of the spectrum.

header_19.raw_response: Diet Coke is a carbonated beverage that is designed to be refreshing and slightly sweet, but it doesn't have a complex or intense flavor profile. It's generally perceived as having a mild sweetness and a crisp, clean taste. While it does have some character, it doesn't fall into the category of being extremely zesty or intensely flavored. Therefore, placing Diet Coke closer to the bland side of the spectrum seems appropriate, but not entirely so. I would place it around the 30 mark, acknowledging its mildly sweet and refreshing taste without it being overly flavorful.
